title: FlexiSearch -New App to find Flexi-Game Teammmates

embed.title: FlexiSearch for LoL - Android Apps on Google Play
embed.description: Simple League of Legends tool to find players for Flexi / Duo games

body:
Hey fellow LoL players!

I have just finished creating my first android application called "FlexiSearch". 
Since Flexi games with 4 players are still disabled, i was often confronted with being in a lobby with 3 friends, unable to find a 5th player.
As a solution i created a simple chatting app, where LoL players can connect to others all around the world, to complete their Flexi team with a 5th player.
On the other hand, single players who want to improve their Flexi rank can look out for team to play with.
If you're interested in checking out and using the app, you can find it here:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kay.TeamSearch

I am looking forward to improve and update this application but the concept only works out, if we manage to achieve a steady user base.

Have a nice day and glhf!
